riddle: I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
I have a heart that doesn’t beat, a mouth that doesn’t speak, and a soul that cannot die. What am I?
I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
I am not alive, but I can grow; I don’t have lungs, but I need air; I don’t have a mouth, and I can drown. What am I?
